channel.title: P90X...........Does It Work?
channel.description: hey well maybe some of you have seen the commercials about that workout routine and whatnot called P90X. im just wondering if anyone has tried it, has it, knows if it works, and would know where to get it(for free). i've googled it and looked around, from what i read it looks good. i work out almost every day, and the concepts of muscle confusion and whatever else so you wont plateau sounds like it makes since to me. so post any info, cause im just wondering what you guys think.
